pages.text: The $(thing)resources HUD$() is the in-game interface that displays your current consumable resource values.$(br2)When first joining the game, this interface is hidden and can be toggled on or off by pressing the $(k:aoa3.resources) key.
pages.title: Resources HUD

pages.text: By default, this $(thing)interface$() appears in the top-right corner of the screen, rendering horizontally.$(br)It can be toggled to a vertical render layout via the $(thing)hudResourcesHorizontal$() config option, or moved to other screen corners with the $(thing)hudResourcesPosition$() config option.

If the $(thing)interface$() is left in the top-right corner of the screen, and the $(thing)disableHudPotionOffset$() config option is left to $(thing)true$(), the HUD will automatically slide downwards when potion effects are shown in the same location.
